Title: Authorizes the retention of funds for special education programs for preschool children that are subject to tuition rate reconciliation
Summary: Authorizes the retention of funds for special education programs for preschool children that are subject to tuition rate reconciliation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the retention of funds for special education programs for preschool children that are subject to tuition rate reconciliation
